Author: RealPaleontologist
Title: [ANN] HybridBlock: All-In-One Cryptocurrency Trading Ecosystem
Body: HYBRIDBLOCK USED A WHITELABEL COMPANY CALLED ALPHA POINT FOR THEIR WHOLE SYSTEM.  Matching Engine, Exchange, HybridTerminal none of it is theirs, NO BS I got concrete proof. Dozens of small regional exchanges use that whitelabel company. If they were gonna whitelabel why do they needed the BS Roadmap? Most whitelabel companies build betas under 120 days and full release under 10 months They raised 50 Million Dollars almost and couldn't bother to out together a team to accomplish it in house, you know why??? BECAUSE THEY DONT CARE ABOUT YOU!!!  50 MILLION DOLLARS. Biggest Scam of the Year.  From what I hear Alpha Point is also hosting them on their servers which is a HUUUUGEEEE SECURITY BREACH! SEC will also be notified. They kicked me out of their Telegram group When I called them out. I have proof of that as well. Posting links with Picture Proof.  https://imgur.com/a/SUYtODo      My Tele Post calling them out. https://imgur.com/a/81Q5yf8      Me getting Booted from the group and messages being deleted. https://imgur.com/a/6z94pH2     HybridBlock Screenshot of Exchange. https://imgur.com/a/i0K8YLn      Alpha Point Website Screenshot with Exchange. https://imgur.com/Ty8FieD         Alpha point company info PDF https://imgur.com/8IsGgx4         side by side.  Download both HybridBlock whitepaper and Alphapoint Doc. Go through it. You can see how terrifyingly similarly worded they are.  More to come. Watch Medium, CoinTelegraph and ICO promoting influencers on youtube. We have to FIGHT BACK against cowardly scammers like these.

Author: HybridBlock
Title: [ANN] HybridBlock: All-In-One Cryptocurrency Trading Ecosystem
Body: The Sale is LIVE and is actually being hosted on the Hybrid Exchange!  Some Quick Updates:  The beta version of Hybrid Exchange is what you will be purchasing tokens from, and it will open for trading when tokens are distributed in June.  BaseTrade is also nearing a beta launch, we expect this to be towards the end of May/beginning of June as it finishes security audit.  HybridTerminal is ahead of schedule (originally September), we’ve been through a live demonstration from our development team and are extremely pleased with features and progress. This platform is a game changer in crypto trading - that said, it needs in-depth testing to meet institutional needs.  HybridCentral has a very basic version in the App Store, this is not anywhere close to a final robust educational program we want but it served as a good starting point for us and we’ve got some exciting design, content and other updates coming out in June.  Thanks everyone!

Author: itsjustdutch
Title: [ANN] HybridBlock: All-In-One Cryptocurrency Trading Ecosystem
Body: The airdrop ended the day the sale opened, last week. I believe these tokens will be distributed once the exchange is live, around June 20th. In telegram they’ve been saying 2 weeks after the close of the sale which is June 6th.  I think this snippet separates them from the pack:  “By utilizing HybridBlock, you also have access to the subset alt-coin market without having to be on Binance with an account open, funded, and AML/KYC approved. i.e. You come to our platform and you have access to other pairs that are on their platform without having the multiple screen/eth/btc transferring etc.”  Discounted trading fees will be a big plus as well. I’m most impressed that they’re hosting the sale on their on exchange. Who else has done that? There were a few hiccups but that’s expected. Overall I’ve been thoroughly impressed and am excited to use these services in the near future.

Author: YIz
Title: [ANN] HybridBlock: All-In-One Cryptocurrency Trading Ecosystem
Body: Public Sale is LIVE  HYB Tokensale  Public Sale Start Date: May 23 Public Sale Closing Date: June 6th Minimum Contribution: 0.25 ETH Public Sale Price: $0.30/HYB JOIN THE SALE NOW: https://tokensale.hybridblock.io/ ERC20 Token Purchase Methods Accepted: BTC, ETH and NCASH Token Supply: 1,000,000,000    Education, Buying and Trading Solutions  HybridBlock is the simplest solution to learning about cryptocurrency, buying coins or tokens, and accessing the most advanced trading platform in the world. We bring the simplicity necessary to unleash exponential mainstream adoption of cryptocurrency. HybridBlock consists of an ecosystem that leverages the power of cryptocurrency.   The HybridBlock Ecosystem  BaseTrade: Easy-to-use platform to buy major cryptocurrencies. With an online shopping cart and secure wallet tailored to regional needs. You can buy coins just as easy as any major online shopping retail outlet.  HybridExchange: A full order book in designated markets and currency pairs that will offer liquidity across third party exchanges and access to optimized liquidity and pricing.  HybridTerminal: The world’s first downloadable, standalone cryptocurrency trading terminal for advanced traders. Institutions and professionals can access direct routing to almost any destination with low latency execution, featuring an optimized Level II quote messaging system. We provide traders with real-time feeds from all the major exchanges.  HybridCentral: Application based education to onboard through simple education modules. Community channels and HybridAcademy’s gamified education system help mass adoption through quickly learning blockchain skills and participation.   Why is HybridBlock important?  HybridBlock solves three major inhibiting factors for mainstream adoption of cryptocurrency by introducing:  1.   A simple, professional and rewarding community-based education platform. 2.   Making users first cryptocurrency purchase as easy as online retail shopping. 3.   A reliable trading platform that performs at Wall Street trading standards.  Our mission is to onboard the masses, and facilitate mass adoption of blockchain solutions to the world.        AMA with the Founders HYB Token  HybridBlock has created the Hybrid Token, which plays a pivotal role in powering the HybridNetwork. Token owners will receive discounted rates, exclusive access to new products and services, and opportunities to invest in future Token Sales. Hybrid tokens serve three primary functions:  1.   Payment of transaction fees and for all services within our network. 2.   To power the market-efficiency mechanism. 3.   As a tradable cryptocurrency available on the open market.  The HybridBlock Token: HYB  HYB tokens are the lifeblood of the HybridBlock ecosystem. HYBs are smart contract tokens built to the ERC20 token standard. They are necessary for discounted trading fees, utilizing the HybridFX network, and advanced HybridCentral content.  HybridFX: HFX  Fiat backed digital token that is maintained at a one-to-one ratio to fiat currency. An alternative to traditional bank.    To be able to create crypto/fiat pairs there will need to be approval of central banking authorities. Thus, the legal part at the start will be crucial to accomplishing this. Does this seem possible in a short notice, or does this have a long term trajectory?  Technically you don’t need any approval from the central bank to do so. Right now there is no regulatory framework (sandbox) in which the rules are clear and open. There is no central government in the world who will allow another currency that will compete with their own FIAT, that would be direct competition. The legal opinion from the team will be critical in terms of HOW HybridBlock operates but in no way does it limit the ability to operate in the Fiat/HFX pair. There will be MANY “stable” coins in the future but the ones who have support or a passthrough via the governments are the ones who will have the best chance at mass adoption. This approach has a medium term trajectory.  What is the main reason to open up the crypto space to an abundance of new participants? What would your advantage be over, for example, Binance?   By utilizing HybridBlock, you also have access to the subset alt-coin market without having to be on Binance with an account open, funded, and AML/KYC approved. i.e. You come to our platform and you have access to other pairs that are on their platform without having the multiple screen/eth/btc transferring etc.  Will your exchange platform consider USD trading pairs rather than TETHER?   For our country specific trading pairs - HybridBlock intends to use HFX token. This will be paired with, for example, HKD/HFX, PESO/HFX, EUR/HFX, etc. The goal is to have the ministry/central banking authorities allow us to operate cleanly and radically transparently. Third party audits on a continual basis that are open and accessible to the public who is in the HFX pairing will give further confidence that there is no fractionalized printing/reserves.  A large portion of your hard cap will be used for your liquidity pools: This increases the market cap and creates a riskier investment than if the funds were just needed for development and operational costs.  Liquidity is king, and it always will be. Regardless of how incredible the tech/team/biz/dev is, without liquidity you are holding a 100 carat diamond with zero buyers which is equal to a great paper weight. What HybridBlock is focused on is mass adoption. By concentrating on 3 specific types of users (Retail, Crypto-Trader, Institution/Professional Trader) imagine the potential of the entire market cap if we achieve our 100m NEW crypto-asset participants. Everyone wins. Other exchanges, multiple alt-assets, etc.   Website - Whitepaper - Token Sale FAQ - Telegram Community - Telegram News Channel - Reddit - Facebook - Twitter

Author: HybridBlock
Title: [ANN] HybridBlock: All-In-One Cryptocurrency Trading Ecosystem
Body: Great Question  Think of it as three different groups of people.   1.) Beginner 2.) Intermediate/experienced 3.) Absolute professional/Institution/Trader/HFT/Quant  Investors from all of these "leagues" have their own needs and abilities.  For example: The HybridTerminal is targeting people who are very familiar with prop trading, sophisticated trading firms, sentiment based algo strategies etc.  The site outlines these differences: https://hybridblock.io/
